name: collusion
author: Atul Varma
description: Visualize who's tracking you in real time. To get started, click on the Collusion icon in the bottom-right corner of your browser. (You may need to show the Add-on Bar to see the icon.)

preferences.name: CollusionSound
preferences.title: Check to hear sounds when cookies are set

preferences.name: collusion.popup
preferences.title: Always show graph in popup panel when new sites are added

preferences.name: collusion.popup.size
preferences.title: Size of popup panel (as fraction of size of window)

preferences.name: collusion.popup.message
preferences.title: Message in popup panel
preferences.value: These sites are using third-party cookies to share data about your web activity.

preferences.name: collusion.reset.timer
preferences.title: Time between automatic resets (milliseconds) - 0 for no reset
